work.name: ioasys
work.position: Shopify Tech Lead for Havaianas North America
work.summary: Responsible for all development work for Havaianas USA, including managing Dev Team, Theme UI, Backend Integrations, Backend Extensions, Performance, SEO, CI/CD.  Also, offering technical support for other Shopify stores served by the company.
highlights: Appointed Tech Lead based on a recommendation from Havaianas' International Technical Director Ecommerce.
Accountable for the technical direction of the Havaianas North America Shopify platform.
Recognized by the Head of DTC for Havaianas US for significant improvements in development team responsiveness, speed, and overall deliverable quality.
Serve as the primary technical architect for the business team, refining requirements, designing custom solutions, and translating them into actionable development tasks.
Hands-on developer contributing to both front-end development and back-end integrations, ensuring Shopify themes and third-party integrations function with minimal downtime or errors.

work.name: ioasys
work.position: Head Shopify Developer for Havaianas North America
work.summary: Main developer responsible for migrating Havaianas USA from Salesforce to Shopify.  Built a brand new theme for the brand, designed by renowned agency 1R, built the integrations with the ERP, DAM, PIM, Returns platform, and mentored the team of 3 who worked on this project, who were unfamiliar with Shopify.
highlights: Served as Head Developer for the migration of Havaianas North America from Salesforce to Shopify, a key corporate project recognized by the CEO and other C-level executives of Alpargatas S.A. (Havaianas' holding company).
Played a critical role in knowledge transfer and project success by mentoring a team of three developers with prior Salesforce experience, accelerating their onboarding to the new Shopify store.
Led the development of a brand-new, mobile-first Shopify theme from scratch, collaborating with a leading LA design agency to align with brand aesthetics and user experience principles.

Designed and developed a custom application using Remix and Node.js to integrate Shopify-generated orders with ERP (SAP), inventory management (SAP), returns platforms (Narvar), and product updates (Akeneo).
Demonstrated initiative and autonomy in problem-solving, independently devising solutions to assigned tasks without direct instructions.

work.name: ioasys
work.position: Shopify Developer for Havaianas LATAM & APAC
work.summary: In-housed all Shopify store management and development, which up until that point had been done by an agency.  The successful in-housing of Shopify expertise within the company was a key factor in allowing the subsequent migration of Havaianas' two biggest stores, Brazil and USA, to Shopify.
highlights: Transitioned into a direct role within Havaianas upon request from Havaianas LATAM's Digital Manager, assuming responsibility for the internal management and development of their Shopify platform, marking a significant career advancement based on performance at Buda Digital.
Selected by Senior Management to deliver a presentation on Shopify for a technical, non-Shopify-specialist audience, showcasing expertise and communication skills.

Served as the "go-to" technical expert for over 10 independent distributors in the LATAM region and integrated with the internal Havaianas interface for the APAC region, managing diverse workloads and ensuring a consistent brand experience.

Played a key role in planning the subsequent migration of Havaianas North America, collaborating with senior management and stakeholders to scope resources, define timelines, and outline steps for a successful migration.

work.name: Buda Digital | Shopify Plus Partner
work.summary: Offered client-facing theme development support, such as bug-fixing and feature-building, for various of Buda's clients, including Havaianas, Mahta and Queijos Ipanema.
highlights: Provided dedicated support for a diverse client portfolio, primarily focused on Havaianas Latin America (excluding Brazil), as well as VC-backed startups like Mahta.
Led the resolution of critical technical issues, ensuring optimal functionality and user experience across multiple Havaianas Latin America e-commerce platforms.
Served as the central point of contact for all Shopify-related inquiries, effectively communicating technical solutions to the Product Owner for Havaianas LATAM, Mahta, and other stakeholders.
